title: How do I post an image on a discussion with Imgur without the imgur thing around it?
body: I really don't like it, it kinda just takes away the feel of the post. People told me to put ?noredirect at the end of it, I did it but it did nothing. Help?

replies.body:
I'm certainly no expert on all the features of the boards, but as far as I know, most services will pop out and have a border around them (if not, our warning popup about links will).

Let me know if you have any questions.
